description:
This folding panel pairs perfectly with Biolite’s BaseCharge line of power stations, making it easy to keep your AC powered devices running when you’re off the grid. Pulling in up to 100W in direct sun, the SolarPanel 100 can keep your favourite USB-powered powerbanks, power stations, and devices, topped up and ready to go.

  • 100W multicrystalline panel with ETFE lamination that's ultra-slim for easy portability and set-up
  • Kickstand and sundial feature that ensures proper alignment and therefore maximum output
  • Connections: 2 x USB type-A, 1 x USB type-C PD (45W), and
  • Daisy chain up to 4 SolarPanel 100s
  • Water resistant design isn’t bothered by a little summer rain
  • Zippered storage pouch for cables and adapters
  • Integrated carrying handles
  • Lanyard tie points at each corner make it easy to attach to a tent, adventure van, or anywhere you have the space
  • Rated Power: 100W
  • Voc: 23.7V
  • Vmpp: 19.8V
  • Imp: 5.0A
  • Isc: 5.3A
  • Dimensions, folded: 51 x 36.2 x 3.8cm, unfolded: 51 x 146 x 2.5cm
name: BioLite SolarPanel 100
